text: Three Encounters () is a 1948 Soviet drama movie directed by Aleksandr Ptushko, Vsevolod Pudovkin and Sergei Yutkevich.Биография Тамары МакаровойТри встречи (1948) It stars Tamara Makarova, Boris Chirkov, and Nikolay Kryuchkov. == Actors == * Tamara Makarova as Olimpiada Samoseeva * Boris Chirkov as Nikanor Samoseev * Nikolay Kryuchkov as Maksim Kornev * Yuliya Borisova as Oksana * Klara Luchko as Bella * Mikhail Derzhavin == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1948 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Sergei Yutkevich Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Ptushko Category:Movies directed by Vsevolod Pudovkin Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Three Encounters
